title: Australia Hails Discovery of Captain Cook’s Endeavour, but U.S. Researchers Wary
sub_head: The wreck site of the HM Bark Endeavour off the U.S. East Coast has long evaded marine archaeologists
body:
SYDNEY—Historians have long puzzled over the whereabouts of a ship sailed by an explorer who is credited with mapping Australia’s east coast and claiming the territory for Britain.
An Australian assertion on Thursday that James Cook’s ship has been found off the U.S. East Coast appeared to put an end to one of the world’s marine mysteries. But in a twist, the claim was disputed by U.S. researchers.
